snippet: Abercrombie & Fitch became the second American company to agree to the legally enforceable plan to improve safety standards in Bangladesh.
abstract: Abercrombie & Fitch says it signed on to landmark plan to improve factory safety in Bangladesh, becoming second American company to agree to legally enforceable plan that more than 24 European retailers and brands have embraced.
lead_paragraph: Abercrombie & Fitch became the second American company to agree to the legally enforceable plan to improve safety standards in Bangladesh.

headline.seo: Abercrombie & Fitch Agrees to Bangladesh Factory Safety Plan
headline.main: Abercrombie & Fitch Signs Bangladesh Safety Plan
headline.print_headline: Abercrombie & Fitch Signs Bangladesh Safety Plan
